ygData.subject: RE: Bayle List
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats OK..i went to a different board and got the results :) And yes its not that amazing. BUT, you never know when it will come in handy...i.e. soulfire/fairy
ygData.messageBody:
Thats OK..i went to a different board and got the
results :)
And yes its not that amazing. BUT, you never know when
it will come in handy...i.e. soulfire/fairy avenger


But again, now that this quest is working, it isnt
difficult. We only thought it was hard because it
wasnt working :)

I would like to know how you got the list from Dyllin
IF you kill him for it.
If spoilers are unwelcome please email me directly.

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Jeremy Pollack <jpollack@...> wrote:
> I hesitated to post a spoiler to the list to ruin it
> for those that want to
> do it themselves. If people want me to post my
> results (and not many object.
> :D) then I will.
>
> I WILL tell you that I got an actual item from the
> quest (handing in the
> decoded list to Pietro Zarn) but it isn't that
> amazing. I *do* wish it fit
> in my range slot so I could use the +15 vs magic
> bonus though. :)
>
> I never handed in the 3 encoded pieces to Kane Bayle
> -- a friend of mine
> did, got a congrats and exp on the first two pieces,
> asking for the rest,
> the he handed in the last, and got .... "thank you
> very much" and no exp
> etc. Sigh.
>
> will write more later
>
>
>
